original_text: Moreover the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel, unto the place over against the water gate toward the east, and the tower that lieth out.
korean_text: (그 때에 느디님 사람은 오벨에 거주하여 동쪽 수문과 마주 대한 곳에서부터 내민 망대까지 이르렀느니라)

sentences.original_text: Moreover the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel
unto the place over against the water gate
and the tower that lieth out
